name: Hotel Blake
description:
Game developed by the Conserjes Místicos team during the 2022 Winter Jam in Uruguay. Thanks to the Jam2Jam team for hosting the event.

This is a game about language and features 18th century savant painter William Blake.

Marcelo Guaraglia / Audio & Music / @marcemoths Sofia Rey / Art & Design / @ramthedragon Rodrigo Sclavi / Code / theuzi95.itch.io Mathias Larrosa / Code / motaico.itch.io/ Guillermo Silva / Art & Design / smyir.itch.io/
